title: Idhayakaani (1975) Tamil MHCe DVD5 - Eng Subs - MGR, Pandari Bai
description:
Idhayakaani (1975) Tamil MHCe DVD5 - Eng Subs - MGR, Radha Saluja [DDR]

Idhayakkani 1975 Tamil:  The Fruit Of The Heart, is a Indian Tamil starring M. G. Ramachandran in the lead role, with Pandari Bai, R. S. Manohar and Radha Saluja among others enacting supporting roles. 
The film, directed by A. Jagannathan, produced by R. M. Veerappan under his Sathya Movies and had musical score by M. S. Viswanathan. 
The film was blockbuster and highest grossing film of the year. 
The film ran for 150 days in theatres.
The film is known for political dialogues and songs.

SYNOPSIS:- Idhayakkani (1975)
IDHAYAKKANI is the story of the kind-hearted Mohan (MGR) whose theory of life is 'equality' and whose puts its practice by sharing equally the income of his estate with his labourers.
He has another passion-he wants to serve country-He has joined police force as an officer.
He meets a needy girl Lakshmi (Radha Saluja), and on the advice of and elderly domestic help, he permits her to stay in his house.
Toungues start wagging and Mohan decides to marry Lakshmi.
However, his happines is short-lived.
He gets the shock of his life when he comes to know that he wife is involved in the murder of leading scientist.
What is the truth ?
Did Lakshmi Murder scientist or she is innocent ?
If so, then who is the culprit ?
How does Mohan go about finding the truth ?
